an6.16:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava bhaggesu viharati susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye.
an6.16:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena nakulapita gahapati abadhiko hoti dukkhito balhagilano.
an6.16:1.3: Atha kho nakulamata gahapatani nakulapitaram gahapatim etadavoca:
an6.16:2.4: Siya kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:2.5: ‘na nakulamata gahapatani mamaccayena sakkhissati darake posetum, gharavasam santharitun’ti.
an6.16:2.6: Na kho panetam, gahapati, evam datthabbam.
an6.16:2.7: Kusalaham, gahapati, kappasam kantitum venim olikhitum.
an6.16:2.8: Sakkomaham, gahapati, tavaccayena darake posetum, gharavasam santharitum.
an6.16:2.9: Tasmatiha tvam, gahapati, ma sapekkho kalamakasi.
an6.16:3.1: Siya kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:3.3: Na kho panetam, gahapati, evam datthabbam.
an6.16:3.4: Tvanceva kho, gahapati, janasi ahanca, yam no solasavassani gahatthakam brahmacariyam samacinnam.
an6.16:3.5: Tasmatiha tvam, gahapati, ma sapekkho kalamakasi.
an6.16:4.1: Siya kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:4.2: ‘nakulamata gahapatani mamaccayena na dassanakama bhavissati bhagavato na dassanakama bhikkhusanghassa’ti.
an6.16:4.3: Na kho panetam, gahapati, evam datthabbam.
an6.16:4.4: Ahanhi, gahapati, tavaccayena dassanakamatara ceva bhavissami bhagavato, dassanakamatara ca bhikkhusanghassa.
an6.16:4.5: Tasmatiha tvam, gahapati, ma sapekkho kalamakasi.
an6.16:5.1: Siya kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:5.3: Na kho panetam, gahapati, evam datthabbam.
an6.16:5.4: Yavata kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato savika gihi odatavasana silesu paripurakariniyo, aham tasam annatara.
an6.16:5.5: Yassa kho panassa kankha va vimati va—ayam so bhagava araham sammasambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye—tam bhagavantam upasankamitva pucchatu.
an6.16:5.6: Tasmatiha tvam, gahapati, ma sapekkho kalamakasi.
an6.16:6.1: Siya kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:6.3: Na kho panetam, gahapati, evam datthabbam.
an6.16:6.4: Yavata kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato savika gihi odatavasana labhiniyo ajjhattam cetosamathassa, aham tasam annatara.
an6.16:6.5: Yassa kho panassa kankha va vimati va—ayam so bhagava araham sammasambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye—tam bhagavantam upasankamitva pucchatu.
an6.16:6.6: Tasmatiha tvam, gahapati, ma sapekkho kalamakasi.
an6.16:7.1: Siya kho pana te, gahapati, evamassa:
an6.16:7.2: ‘na nakulamata gahapatani imasmim dhammavinaye ogadhappatta patigadhappatta assasappatta tinnavicikiccha vigatakathankatha vesarajjappatta aparappaccaya satthusasane viharati’ti.
an6.16:7.3: Na kho panetam, gahapati, evam datthabbam.
an6.16:7.4: Yavata kho, gahapati, tassa bhagavato savika gihi odatavasana imasmim dhammavinaye ogadhappatta patigadhappatta assasappatta tinnavicikiccha vigatakathankatha vesarajjappatta aparappaccaya satthusasane viharanti, aham tasam annatara.
an6.16:7.5: Yassa kho panassa kankha va vimati va—ayam so bhagava araham sammasambuddho bhaggesu viharati susumaragire bhesakalavane migadaye—tam bhagavantam upasankamitva pucchatu.
an6.16:7.6: Tasmatiha tvam, gahapati, ma sapekkho kalamakasi.
an6.16:8.1: Atha kho nakulapituno gahapatissa nakulamatara gahapataniya imina ovadena ovadiyamanassa so abadho thanaso patippassambhi.
an6.16:8.2: Vutthahi ca nakulapita gahapati tamha abadha;
an6.16:8.3: tatha pahino ca pana nakulapituno gahapatissa so abadho ahosi.
an6.16:8.4: Atha kho nakulapita gahapati gilana vutthito aciravutthito gelanna dandamolubbha yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho nakulapitaram gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an6.16:9.2: Yassa te nakulamata gahapatani anukampika atthakama ovadika anusasika.
an6.16:9.3: Yavata kho, gahapati, mama savika gihi odatavasana silesu paripurakariniyo, nakulamata gahapatani tasam annatara.
an6.16:9.4: Yavata kho, gahapati, mama savika gihi odatavasana labhiniyo ajjhattam cetosamathassa, nakulamata gahapatani tasam annatara.
an6.16:9.5: Yavata kho, gahapati, mama savika gihi odatavasana imasmim dhammavinaye ogadhappatta patigadhappatta assasappatta tinnavicikiccha vigatakathankatha vesarajjappatta aparappaccaya satthusasane viharanti, nakulamata gahapatani tasam annatara.
an6.16:9.6: Labha te, gahapati, suladdham te, gahapati.
an6.16:9.7: Yassa te nakulamata gahapatani anukampika atthakama ovadika anusasika”ti.
